item.title: Google Data Studio : Powerful and easy data visualization
item.description: Overview Google Data Studio is a tool engineers and analysts can use to visualize and present data. It is the equivalent of using Excel or Google Sheets to generate graphs and plots but for data in different data stores (eg. Google BigQuery). I became acquainted with Data Studio through work. I had a large dataset and results from a very large processing job that I wanted to turn into a report.
